list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Standardize string quotations and update alignment in various files.
- Replace all single quotes with double quotes across `convex/auth.config.ts`, `convex/documents.ts`, and other components. - Adjust formatting and alignment for improved readability in files such as `navbar.tsx`, `template-gallery.tsx`, `search-input.tsx`. - Add error handling and navigation in `template-gallery.tsx` for better user experience during template creation.

task.summary: Initialize Next.js project with Tailwind CSS, ESLint, and base configurations.
Add UI primitive components with Radix UI and custom styles.
Enhance project setup with Prettier, ESLint, and TailwindCSS configurations. Optimize imports and improve formatting across components.
Integrate TipTap editor into document page and simplify DocumentsLayout structure. Add TipTap dependencies.

Update TipTap editor implementation with additional extensions and improved table handling.
- Add new TipTap extensions (Image, Table, TaskList, and resize capabilities). - Update dependencies for TipTap-related packages in `package.json` and `package-lock.json`.

Add Toolbar and extensions for advanced text styling in TipTap editor.
- Implement `Toolbar` with buttons for text formatting, alignment, and other actions. - Introduce `font-size` and `line-height` extensions for enhanced text customization. - Integrate `Toolbar` into the document page.

Add Ruler component for adjustable margins in TipTap editor.
- Implement `Ruler` for visual margin adjustment via draggable markers. - Integrate `Ruler` into the editor interface. - Update dependencies to include `react-icons` for marker icons.

Integrate Navbar into document page for enhanced user interaction.
- Implement `Navbar` with improved layout for file, edit, and format menus. - Add `DocumentInput` component for document title display. - Include `logo.svg` for branding and navigation. - Update `Toolbar` styling and integrate within the `Navbar`.

Add save functionality for JSON, HTML, and Text formats in Navbar.
- Implement export handlers for JSON, HTML, and Text from the editor. - Update Navbar menu items to trigger respective save actions.

Remove unused hooks and SVG assets, add new assets and components for document templates.
- Delete unused `use-mobile.tsx`, `use-toast.ts`, and old SVG assets. - Add new SVG assets for document templates: `software-proposal.svg`, `resume.svg`. - Create `Navbar` component under `src/app/(home)` for enhanced navigation.

Integrate document management functionalities with Convex backend and UI components.
- Implement `DocumentsTable` and `DocumentRow` components to list documents. - Add `RenameDialog` and `RemoveDialog` components for document renaming and deletion. - Create dropdown menu for document actions, including open in a new tab. - Set up Convex queries and mutations for document CRUD operations. - Configure Clerk authentication middleware and integrate `UserButton` in Navbar.

Standardize string quotations and update alignment in various files.
- Replace all single quotes with double quotes across `convex/auth.config.ts`, `convex/documents.ts`, and other components. - Adjust formatting and alignment for improved readability in files such as `navbar.tsx`, `template-gallery.tsx`, `search-input.tsx`. - Add error handling and navigation in `template-gallery.tsx` for better user experience during template creation.

MESSAGE.value: Initialize Next.js project with Tailwind CSS, ESLint, and base configurations.
Add UI primitive components with Radix UI and custom styles.
Enhance project setup with Prettier, ESLint, and TailwindCSS configurations. Optimize imports and improve formatting across components.
Integrate TipTap editor into document page and simplify DocumentsLayout structure. Add TipTap dependencies.

Update TipTap editor implementation with additional extensions and improved table handling.
- Add new TipTap extensions (Image, Table, TaskList, and resize capabilities). - Update dependencies for TipTap-related packages in `package.json` and `package-lock.json`.

Add Toolbar and extensions for advanced text styling in TipTap editor.
- Implement `Toolbar` with buttons for text formatting, alignment, and other actions. - Introduce `font-size` and `line-height` extensions for enhanced text customization. - Integrate `Toolbar` into the document page.

Add Ruler component for adjustable margins in TipTap editor.
- Implement `Ruler` for visual margin adjustment via draggable markers. - Integrate `Ruler` into the editor interface. - Update dependencies to include `react-icons` for marker icons.

Integrate Navbar into document page for enhanced user interaction.
- Implement `Navbar` with improved layout for file, edit, and format menus. - Add `DocumentInput` component for document title display. - Include `logo.svg` for branding and navigation. - Update `Toolbar` styling and integrate within the `Navbar`.

Add save functionality for JSON, HTML, and Text formats in Navbar.
- Implement export handlers for JSON, HTML, and Text from the editor. - Update Navbar menu items to trigger respective save actions.

Remove unused hooks and SVG assets, add new assets and components for document templates.
- Delete unused `use-mobile.tsx`, `use-toast.ts`, and old SVG assets. - Add new SVG assets for document templates: `software-proposal.svg`, `resume.svg`. - Create `Navbar` component under `src/app/(home)` for enhanced navigation.

Integrate document management functionalities with Convex backend and UI components.
- Implement `DocumentsTable` and `DocumentRow` components to list documents. - Add `RenameDialog` and `RemoveDialog` components for document renaming and deletion. - Create dropdown menu for document actions, including open in a new tab. - Set up Convex queries and mutations for document CRUD operations. - Configure Clerk authentication middleware and integrate `UserButton` in Navbar.

Standardize string quotations and update alignment in various files.
- Replace all single quotes with double quotes across `convex/auth.config.ts`, `convex/documents.ts`, and other components. - Adjust formatting and alignment for improved readability in files such as `navbar.tsx`, `template-gallery.tsx`, `search-input.tsx`. - Add error handling and navigation in `template-gallery.tsx` for better user experience during template creation.
